sentences.en: After the course is cogitative, decide development is versed in avocation machines a village.
sentences.cn: 经过深思熟虑后, 决定开发工副业加工小区.

sentences.en: At present reading funnies is his favorite avocation.
sentences.cn: 目前看连环画是他最好的业余爱好.

sentences.en: Bookkeeping is Mr. Jones'vocation, and photography is his avocation.
sentences.cn: 薄记是琼斯先生的职业, 照像是他的副业.

sentences.en: He is a doctor by profession and a novelist by avocation.
sentences.cn: 他的职业是医生,副业是作家.

sentences.en: He was a printer by trade and naturalist by avocation.
sentences.cn: 他从事印刷业，同时是个博物学爱好者。

sentences.en: He was going to talk about writing as an avocation.
sentences.cn: 他打算谈谈业余写作的体会.

sentences.en: His vocation coincides with his avocation.
sentences.cn: 他的职业同他的爱好完全一致.

sentences.en: Learning foreign languages is just avocation with me.
sentences.cn: 学外语是我的业余爱好.

sentences.en: Louis'avocation as a ski i tructor gradually became his full - time employment.
sentences.cn: 滑雪教练一职已从路易斯的副业逐渐变成他的全职了.

sentences.en: Louis'avocation as a ski instructor gradually became his full - time employment.
sentences.cn: 滑雪教练一职已从路易斯的副业变成他的全职了.

sentences.en: Make authorship your avocation, not your vocation.
sentences.cn: 把写作当作你的副业, 不要把它当作正业.

sentences.en: My uncle, an accountant, composes music as an avocation.
sentences.cn: 我叔叔是一位会计师, 作曲是他的嗜好.

sentences.en: Teaching is my vocation and writing is my avocation.
sentences.cn: 教书是我的职业,写作是我的副业.

trans.tran_en: Your avocation is a job or activity that you do because you are interested in it, rather than to earn your living
